name: Purpose (8enB)
description:
0ng the robot is lost and needs to make their way through a ship and discover their Purpose!

This game is in the style of classic Gameboy games. It uses the same colour pallet, screen size, resolution, sound, and amount of buttons as original Gameboy games!

Purpose is a metroidvania and there are 3 endings! Can you find them all?!?!

Controls:

Z = Jump

X = Interact / attack (when holding gun)

Arrow Keys = Move left and right

Credits:

UnknownAnswers - itch.io - Art, Design, Programming

8enB - itch.io - Design, Programming lead

David Fesliyan - Music
